did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Eleazar Diaz Herraras Oral Interview / Conducted by Laurence O. "Pat" Henry 1982
did.abstract: Typescript transcript (photocopy) of reminiscences of Tucson (Ariz.) architect noted for restoration of historic buildings including Mission San Xavier del Bac. Includes interviewer's edits.
